PHRASE.LANG: You'll feel like part of the old west when you don this cowgirl outfit. Bundle includes hat, top, bottom, pistol, and boots. [#Legal]
Vivez l'aventure du Far West dans ce costume de cow-girl. Ce pack comprend un chapeau, un haut, un pantalon, un revolver et des bottes. [#Legal]
Mit diesem Cowgirl-Outfit fühlt man sich wie eine Bewohnerin des Wilden Westens. Im Paket enthalten sind Hut, Ober- und Unterteil, Pistole und Stiefel. [#Legal]
Ti sentirai parte del vecchio west indossando questa tenuta da cowgirl. Il pacchetto include cappello, giacca, pantaloni, pistola e stivali. [#Legal]
Cuando te pongas este traje de vaquera te sentirás parte del viejo oeste. El conjunto comprende sombrero, torso, pantalones, revólver y botas. [#Legal]
건슬링어 의상을 입고 서부에서 명성을 날려 보세요. 이 세트는 모자, 상의, 하의, 권총, 그리고 부츠를 포함합니다. [#Legal]
You'll feel like part of the old west when you don this cowgirl outfit. Bundle includes hat, top, bottom, pistol, and boots. [#Legal]
穿上這套女牛仔服裝，讓你仿如身處舊西部。本服裝組包括帽子、上身、下身、手槍和靴。[#Legal]
穿上這套女牛仔服裝，讓你仿如身處舊西部。本服裝組包括帽子、上半身、下半身、手槍和靴。[#Legal]
You'll feel like part of the old west when you don this cowgirl outfit. Bundle includes hat, top, bottom, pistol, and boots. [#Legal]
